description: Manual 6-axis camera control with position (X, Y, Z) and rotation (Pitch, Yaw, Roll). Sends all 6 values in a single command. Position and rotation update together on every slider change.

POST.description: Sets camera position and rotation simultaneously. All 6 values sent together.
POST.notes: Position values are offsets from the current CAMSHOT preset. Set a CAMSHOT first, then use CAMSTREAM to fine-tune.
